Headline: Delays at Clark/Lake Affecting Kimball-BOUND Brown and Harlem-Bound Green Line Service
ShortDescription: Kimball-BOUND Brown and Harlem-Bound Green Line trains are experiencing a delay at Clark/Lake: due to signal problems. Update to follow.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-BOUND Brown and Harlem-Bound Green Line trains are experiencing a delay at Clark/Lake: due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore service/Assistance has been requested and we hope to resume service shortly.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Updates will be posted as new information becomes available.

Allow extra travel time.
